text: The 1160s BC is a decade which lasted from 1169 BC to 1160 BC. ==Events and trends== * 1166 BC—The start of the Discordian calendar and within Discordianism the date of the Curse of Greyface. * 1162 BC—The statue of Marduk is taken from Babylon by Elamite conquerors. * 1160 BC—Ancient Nubia regains independence from Egypt, after long having served as its vice-royalty since its annexation by Pharaoh Ahmose I. ==Significant people== * Ramesses V, Egyptian pharaoh
title: 1160s BC
